variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application,from:-30m
| filter entity.detected_name == "astroshop-frontend"
| fieldsAdd clusterId = clustered_by
| fieldsFlatten clusterId 
| fields  dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster = clusterId.dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
| fields k8s.cluster.name = entityName(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)

fetch dt.entity.cloud_application, from: -7d
| filter entity.name == "astroshop-frontend"
| sort lifetime[start] desc
| fields id
| limit 1

fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| filter entity.name == "astroshop-shippingservice"
| fieldsAdd lifetime
| sort lifetime[start] desc
| limit 1
| fields id

fetch dt.davis.problems, from: -7d
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE" or
         event.status == "CLOSED"
| sort timestamp desc
| expand affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd service.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd process.group = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.process_group")
| fieldsAdd k8.workload.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.cloud_application")
| filter in(root_cause_entity_name, "frontend") or
         in(process.group, "server.js (frontend) astroshop-frontend-*") or
         in(k8.workload.name, "astroshop-frontend") or
         in(service.name, "frontend")
| filterOut matchesPhrase (event.name, "Astroshop")
| dedup event.id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 1
| fields event.id

fetch dt.davis.problems, from: -7d
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false 
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE" or 
         event.status == "CLOSED" 
| filter matchesPhrase (event.name, "Astroshop - Orders with Zero Values") or
         startsWith (event.name, "Business Flow Astroshop - Order to Shipped")
| dedup event.id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 1
| fields event.id

fetch dt.davis.problems, from: -7d
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false and event.status 
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE" or
         event.status == "CLOSED" 
| sort timestamp desc
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service") or
         affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.cloud_application") or
         affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.process_group")      
| fieldsAdd service.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd process.group = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.process_group")
| fieldsAdd k8.workload.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.cloud_application") 
| filter in(service.name, "frauddetectionservice") or
         in(k8.workload.name, "astroshop-frauddetectionservice")
| filterOut matchesPhrase (event.name, "Astroshop")
| dedup event.id

fetch dt.davis.problems, from: -7d
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false 
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE" or
         event.status == "CLOSED" 
| filter matchesPhrase(event.name, "Fraud") and matchesPhrase(event.name, "Astroshop")
| filterOut startsWith (event.name, "Business Flow Astroshop - Order to Shipped")
| dedup event.id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 1
| fields event.id

fetch dt.davis.problems, from: -7d
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false 
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE" or
         event.status == "CLOSED" 
| sort timestamp desc
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service") or
         affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.cloud_application") or
         affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.process_group")      
| fieldsAdd service.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd process.group = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.process_group")
| fieldsAdd k8.workload.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.cloud_application") 
| filter in(service.name, "shippingservice") or
         in(k8.workload.name, "astroshop-shippingservice")
| filterOut matchesPhrase (event.name, "Astroshop")
| dedup event.id

fetch dt.davis.problems, from: -7d
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false 
| filter event.status == "ACTIVE" or
         event.status == "CLOSED" 
| filter matchesPhrase(event.name, "Shipped") and matchesPhrase(event.name, "Astroshop")
| filterOut startsWith (event.name, "Business Flow Astroshop - Order to Shipped")
| dedup event.id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 1
| fields event.id

1.content:
## üíª Place Order
---
üíº Business KPI = Average order value.

2.content:
## üöö Order Shipped
---
üíº Business KPI = Order shipping success rate.

3.content:
## ü™™ Fraud Check
---
üíº Business KPI = Average Fraud Check Duration.

4.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
//| filter in(vulnerability.risk.level,"CRITICAL") or in(vulnerability.risk.level,"HIGH")
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,{"CODE_LIBRARY","SOFTWARE","CONTAINER_ORCHESTRATION"})
| filter in(related_entities.kubernetes_workloads.names, "astroshop-frontend")

| fieldsAdd dt.entity.cloud_application = related_entities.kubernetes_workloads.ids
| expand dt.entity.cloud_application
| fieldsAdd zeroplaceholder = 0
| summarize vulnerabilities = countDistinctExact(vulnerability.display_id),
            zero = sum(zeroplaceholder)
| fields vulnerabilities = coalesce(vulnerabilities, zero)

5.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false and event.status == "ACTIVE"
// | filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false and event.status == "CLOSED"
| sort timestamp desc
| expand affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd service.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd process.group = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.process_group")
| fieldsAdd k8.workload.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.cloud_application")
| filter in(root_cause_entity_name, "frontend") or
         in(process.group, "server.js (frontend) astroshop-frontend-*") or
         in(k8.workload.name, "astroshop-frontend") or
         in(service.name, "frontend")
| filterOut matchesPhrase (event.name, "Astroshop")
| dedup event.id
| summarize open = count()

6.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| summarize averageOrderValue = avg(revenue)

7.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| fields timestamp,revenue
| makeTimeseries //{Orders = count(),
                 Revenue = avg(revenue),
                 interval:1m

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.Stati.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| fields timestamp,revenue
| makeTimeseries //{Orders = count(),
                 Revenue = avg(revenue),
                 interval:1m

10.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" 
| filter event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" or event.type == "order.received" or event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd placeOrderTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success", timestamp), receivedTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", timestamp)
| summarize {placeOrderTime = takeMin(placeOrderTimestamp), 
            receivedTime = takeMin(receivedTimestamp)}, 
            by:{orderId, timestamp = bin(timestamp,5m)}
| filterOut isNull(receivedTime) or isNull(placeOrderTime)
| fieldsAdd totalTime = receivedTime - placeOrderTime
| summarize `End-to-end order time` = avg(totalTime)

11.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
//| filter in(vulnerability.risk.level,"CRITICAL") or in(vulnerability.risk.level,"HIGH")
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,{"CODE_LIBRARY","SOFTWARE","CONTAINER_ORCHESTRATION"})
| filter in(related_entities.kubernetes_workloads.names, "astroshop-frauddetectionservice")

| fieldsAdd dt.entity.cloud_application = related_entities.kubernetes_workloads.ids
| expand dt.entity.cloud_application
| fieldsAdd zeroplaceholder = 0
| summarize vulnerabilities = countDistinctExact(vulnerability.display_id),
            zero = sum(zeroplaceholder)
| fields vulnerabilities = coalesce(vulnerabilities, zero)

12.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false and event.status == "ACTIVE"
//| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false and event.status == "CLOSED"
| sort timestamp desc
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service") or
         affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.cloud_application") or
         affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.process_group")      
| fieldsAdd service.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd process.group = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.process_group")
| fieldsAdd k8.workload.name = entityName(affected_entity_ids,type:"dt.entity.cloud_application") 
| filter in(service.name, "frauddetectionservice") or
         in(k8.workload.name, "astroshop-frauddetectionservice")
| filterOut matchesPhrase (event.name, "Astroshop")
| dedup event.id
| summarize open = count()

13.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" 
| filter event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" or 
         event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success" or
         event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success" 
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd placeOrderTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success", timestamp), 
            fraudCheckTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", timestamp)
| summarize {placeOrderTime = takeMin(placeOrderTimestamp), 
            fraudCheckTime = takeMin(fraudCheckTimestamp)
            }, 
            by:{orderId, timestamp = bin(timestamp,5m)}
| filterOut isNull(placeOrderTime) or 
            isNull(fraudCheckTime)
| fieldsAdd end_to_end = fraudCheckTime - placeOrderTime 
| makeTimeseries `End-to-end time` = avg(end_to_end),
                  interval:5m

15.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter in(vulnerability.risk.level,"CRITICAL") or in(vulnerability.risk.level,"HIGH")
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,{"CODE_LIBRARY","SOFTWARE","CONTAINER_ORCHESTRATION"})
| filter in(related_entities.kubernetes_workloads.names, "astroshop-shippingservice")

| fieldsAdd dt.entity.cloud_application = related_entities.kubernetes_workloads.ids
| expand dt.entity.cloud_application
| fieldsAdd zeroplaceholder = 0
| summarize vulnerabilities = countDistinctExact(vulnerability.display_id),
            zero = sum(zeroplaceholder)
| fields vulnerabilities = coalesce(vulnerabilities, zero)

16.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop"  
| filter event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success" or 
         event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success"
| fieldsAdd status =  if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", "success", 
                      else: if(event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success",  "failure"))
| summarize {successes = countIf(status == "success"), 
            failures =  countIf(status == "failure")},
            by:{timestamp = bin(timestamp,10m)}
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd failures = if(failures > successes, successes, else:failures)
| fieldsAdd Success = toDouble(failures)/toDouble(successes) * 100
| fieldsAdd Failed = 100 - toDouble(Success)
| Summarize KPI = avg(Success)

18.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop"  
| filter event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success" or 
         event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success"
| fieldsAdd status =  if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", "success", 
                      else: if(event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success",  "failure"))
| summarize successes = countIf(status == "success"), failures =  countIf(status == "failure"),
            by:{timestamp = bin(timestamp,10m)}
| sort timestamp desc
| fieldsAdd failures = if(failures > successes, successes, else:failures)
| fieldsAdd Success = toDouble(failures)/toDouble(successes) * 100
| fieldsAdd Failed = 100 - toDouble(Success)
| makeTimeseries Success = avg(Success), Failed = avg(Failed), interval:10m

22.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop"
| filter revenue == 0
| fieldsAdd zeroplaceholder = 0
| makeTimeseries  `Zero Dollar Orders` = countIf(revenue == 0),
                  interval:1m

23.content:
### Average Order Size
---
Value over time, Davis highlights where the value is higher or lower than expected.

24.content:
### Zero Dollar Orders
---
This can occur when data synchronization failures occur between Inventory and E-commerce systems.

25.content:
### Fraud Check Duration
---
Trend of how long the fraud check service takes per order.  SLO = üü¢ 0-300ms üü† 300ms-500ms üî¥  >500ms

26.content:
### Shipped Success Rate
---
Trend of when orders are shipped successfully üü¢ or have issues üî¥

27.content:
### Order to Shipped Funnel
---
Number of flows by sequential steps

28.content:
### Orders vs End to End Duration
---
Track end-to-end process delays and impact on orders.

30.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" 
| filter event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" or 
         event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success" or
         event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success" 
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd placeOrderTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success", timestamp), 
            fraudCheckTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", timestamp),
            orderShippedTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success", timestamp)
| summarize {orders = count(),
            placeOrderTime = takeMin(placeOrderTimestamp), 
            fraudCheckTime = takeMin(fraudCheckTimestamp),
            orderShippedTime = takeMin(orderShippedTimestamp)
            }, 
            by:{orderId, timestamp = bin(timestamp,5m)}
// | filterOut isNull(placeOrderTime) or 
//             isNull(fraudCheckTime) or
//             isNull(orderShippedTime)
| fieldsAdd end_to_end = orderShippedTime - placeOrderTime,
            placeOrder_to_fraudcheck = orderShippedTime - fraudCheckTime,
            fraudCheck_to_ordershipped = orderShippedTime - fraudCheckTime
| makeTimeseries {
                 Orders = sum(orders),
                 `End-To-End Time` = avg(end_to_end) /*, 
 /*                `Place Order to Fraud Check` = avg(placeOrder_to_fraudcheck),
                 `Fraud Check to Order Shipped` = avg(fraudCheck_to_ordershipped)
 */                
                 },
                 interval:5m

31.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop"
| fieldsAdd step = if(event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success", "Place Order", 
                   else:if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", "Fraud Check",  
                   else:if(event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success", "Order Shipped")))
| summarize `Place Order` = countIf(event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"),
            `Order Shipped` = countIf(event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success")
| fields ordersLost = `Place Order` - `Order Shipped`

32.content:
### Orders by Country
---
Number  or Orders by Country

33.content:
### Probable lost orders
---
Orders which started but not shipped due to shipping service issues.

34.query:
timeseries placeorder.success = sum(bizevents.astroshop.placeorder.success), 
by:{country}
| fieldsAdd count = arraySum(placeorder.success)
| fields count, country
| sort count desc

35.content:
### Probable revenue lost in Shipped
---
---
Orders revenue lost due to falied shipping

36.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop"  
| filter event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" or 
         event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success"

| summarize {revenue = sum(revenue),
            eventTypes = collectDistinct(event.type)}, 
            by:{timestamp = bin(timestamp,10m), orderId}
| filter in(eventTypes, "astroshop.placeorder.success") and not 
         in(eventTypes, "astroshop.ordershipped.success")
| summarize possibleLostRevenue = sum(revenue)
